response_requirements.initial_response_description: Immediate access if records available; if in active use or storage, must be available within 3 working days; custodian may require up to 24 hours advance notice
response_requirements.final_response_notes: 3 working days if records in active use or storage; otherwise immediate during business hours
response_requirements.ag_review_timeline: 3 working days for personnel records opinions

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Custodian bears cost of separating exempt from non-exempt information; no search fees permitted
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Reasonable fees for copies; may require pre-payment if fees exceed $25

exemptions.description: Personnel records and evaluation records (employee may access own records)
Working papers and correspondence of Governor, legislators, judges, and Attorney General
Competitive advantage information and certain financial records

appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal required; may proceed directly to circuit court where records located or meeting occurred; burden of proof for exemption on custodian
appeal_process.second_level_notes: For personnel records, may seek immediate Attorney General opinion within 3 working days
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Court may assess costs, attorney fees, and expenses if custodian or requester acted in bad faith

requester_requirements.purpose_notes: Must be Arkansas citizen; no requirement to state purpose
requester_requirements.request_format_notes: May request in person, by phone, mail, fax, email, or other electronic means; must be sufficiently specific to locate records
requester_requirements.specific_format: Request must be sufficiently specific to enable custodian to locate records with reasonable effort

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Custodian responsible for records; no specific records officer designation required
agency_obligations.response_format_options: May provide copies through various means including image capture, photography, video, and digital recording
agency_obligations.liberal_construction: Adopted to promote open and public performance of public business
agency_obligations.third_party_notification: Custodian or requestor may request third party review

oversight_body.name: Arkansas Attorney General
oversight_body.role: Issues opinions on personnel records within 3 working days upon request; publishes FOIA handbook

primary_sources: Arkansas Code Annotated Title 25, Chapter 19, Sections 25-19-101 through 25-19-109
Arkansas Attorney General FOIA Handbook (19th Edition)
Arkansas Freedom of Information Act statutory text
validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields verified from official Arkansas statute. Ground truth shows 10 business days response time. Immediate access if records available; 3 working days if in active use/storage. Custodian may require up to 24 hours advance notice. Residency requirement - must be Arkansas citizen. No administrative appeals - direct to circuit court. Attorney fees available if bad faith found (either side). Custodian bears cost of separating exempt/non-exempt. Pre-payment may be required if fees exceed $25. Criminal penalties: Class C misdemeanor, up to $500 fine. Enacted February 14, 1967 - one of the strongest open government laws in the US.
